message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and rarity of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $850000 for such an item. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I was thinking that we could meet in the middle at $900000. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm willing to compromise to make this work.
I understand your willingness to compromise, Alice. I am willing to consider your offer, but I would like to counter with a price of $875000. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I was thinking that we could get even closer to my original price. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $920000. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer $880000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations and our current discussion.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $915000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

I'm grateful for your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $890000 for the product. I hope this proposal will lead us to a satisfactory conclusion.
